DATA.title: Design and implement operational ledger for real-time posting and holds
DATA.summary: Establish a core operational ledger that enables instant transaction posting, supports account holds, and manages real-time funds movements. The design must prioritize high availability and precise balance segregation to facilitate rapid transaction processing. The ledger should integrate smoothly with downstream systems while retaining operational reliability.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: operational ledger that enables instant transaction posting, supports account holds, and manages real-time funds movements

DATA.title: Design and implement reporting ledger for regulatory and reconciliation purposes
DATA.summary: Create a robust reporting ledger engineered to support regulatory compliance and regulatory reporting. The reporting ledger must enable thorough financial reconciliation, auditability, and support for oversight requirements. The solution should be aligned with best practices in compliance and data integrity.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: reporting ledger engineered to support regulatory compliance and regulatory reporting

DATA.title: Ensure transaction postings occur in both ledgers and are metadata-linked
DATA.summary: Guarantee that each transaction is posted both to the operational and reporting ledgers, and that all postings are linked using robust metadata for traceability. This ensures synchronized transaction records, facilitates unified auditing, and enables downstream integration with compliance systems.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: posted both to the operational and reporting ledgers, and all postings are linked using robust metadata

DATA.title: Track and differentiate phantom balances within operational ledger
DATA.summary: Implement mechanisms to accurately track phantom or pending balances within the operational ledger and clearly distinguish them from settled balances. This distinction is necessary to prevent errors in fund availability and to support compliance with reconciliation protocols.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: track phantom or pending balances within the operational ledger and clearly distinguish them from settled balances

DATA.title: Develop logic for phantom transaction lifecycle (create, update, expire, settle, reverse)
DATA.summary: Design and implement lifecycle management logic for phantom transactions, supporting their creation, update, expiration, settlement, and reversal. This logic underpins accurate balance representations and ensures a reliable audit trail for pending and converted transactions.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: implement lifecycle management logic for phantom transactions

DATA.title: Expose phantom balances with proper status in customer and internal UIs
DATA.summary: Surface phantom balances, along with their current processing status (pending, settled, reversed, etc.), in both customer-facing and internal user interfaces. This ensures transparency for users and enables internal monitoring and prompt issue resolution.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Surface phantom balances, along with processing status, in customer and internal interfaces

DATA.title: Provide scheduled batch reconciliation between phantom and settled balances
DATA.summary: Integrate batch processes that regularly reconcile differences between phantom and settled balances, ensuring that operational and reporting ledgers remain fully synchronized. These routine reconciliations help detect anomalies and support regulatory accuracy.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: provide scheduled batch reconciliation between phantom and settled balances

DATA.title: Flag and report exceptions in balance reconciliation
DATA.summary: Implement detection and reporting mechanisms for exceptions encountered during balance reconciliation, so that any mismatches or processing anomalies are promptly flagged. These exception reports must be available for both real-time and batch reconciliation processes.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: report exceptions encountered during balance reconciliation

DATA.title: Build reconciliation tools to detect and resolve ledger mismatches
DATA.summary: Develop interactive and automated reconciliation tools designed to identify and resolve discrepancies between operational and reporting ledgers. These tools must enable effective resolution workflows and generate comprehensive audit logs for all actions taken.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: automated reconciliation tools to identify and resolve ledger mismatches

DATA.title: Implement manual and automated exception resolution workflows with audit trails
DATA.summary: Deliver robust exception resolution workflows—both manual and automated—accompanied by immutable audit trails for every action taken. The solution should enable efficient issue resolution, ensure regulatory auditability, and support clear separation of roles for compliance purposes.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: exception resolution workflows—manual and automated—with immutable audit trails
